key.name: log_description
key.value:
Above is the result of your import. You can now go browse all members.

IMPORTANT: You should make mass mailing (send broadcast message) to all users on your Ning site to let them know about the move and the new URL of your site.

For that,

Go to your Ning social network -> Manage -> Broadcast Message

IMPORTANT: Imported users should use their emails for password when logging in. Tip them to change their passwords as soon as possible.

key.name: upload_description
key.value:
Here you can import your user data from a Ning site. Unfortunately, this will not export your content (like photos, discussions, videos, etc) because Ning only lets you export user data.

Before the import it's a good idea to make everyone aware you are moving. This will prevent people from signing up on the old site so you don't have to make multiple imports. Place a text box at the top of the index page on your Ning site with the following code:

We are moving!

Log in to your profile at our new site: {$site_url}

This will look like this:

We are moving!

Log in to your profile at our new site: {$site_url}

Now,

Go to your Ning network -> Manage -> Members -> Export All Member Data (.CSV)

Attention:Before importing make your Ning network public. Remove any password protection and guests-only modes, otherwise avatars will not be transferred!

You will be prompted to save a file.Upload this file here and we will try to import your user data to this site. You can try this multiple times, duplicate users will not be created.
